verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G3048>collection<s%> for the <S%G40>saints,<s%> as I have given <S%G1299>order<s%> to the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G1053>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> you.

On the <S%G3391>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week<s%> let <S%G1538>every<s%> one of you <S%G5087>lay<s%> by him in <S%G2343>store,<s%> as God has <S%G2137>prospered<s%> him, that there be <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3048>gatherings<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G2064>come.<s%>

And <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G3854>come,<s%> <S%G3739>whomsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> you shall <S%G1381>approve<s%> by your <S%G1992>letters,<s%> them will I <S%G3992>send<s%> to <S%G667>bring<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5485>liberality<s%> to <S%G2419>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%G1437>if<s%> it be <S%G514>meet<s%> that I <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G2504>also,<s%> they shall <S%G4198>go<s%> with me.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> I will <S%G2064>come<s%> to you, <S%G3752>when<s%> I shall <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia:<s%> for I do <S%G1330>pass<s%> <S%G1330>through<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia.<s%>

And it may be that I will <S%G3887>abide,<s%> <S%G2228>yes,<s%> and <S%G3914>winter<s%> with you, that you may <S%G4311>bring<s%> me on my journey <S%G3757>wherever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G4198>go.<s%>

For I <S%G2309>will<s%> not <S%G1492>see<s%> you <S%G737>now<s%> by the <S%G3938>way;<s%> but I <S%G1679>trust<s%> to <S%G1961>tarry<s%> a <S%G5550>while<s%> <S%G5099><s%> with you, <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2010>permit.<s%>
But I will <S%G1961>tarry<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G4005>Pentecost.<s%>
For a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> and <S%G1756>effectual<s%> is <S%G455>opened<s%> to me, and there are <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G480>adversaries.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G991>see<s%> that he may be with you <S%G870>without<s%> <S%G870>fear:<s%> for he <S%G2038>works<s%> the <S%G2041>work<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> as I <S%G2532>also<s%> do.

Let <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1848>despise<s%> him: but <S%G4311>conduct<s%> him <S%G4311>forth<s%> in <S%G1515>peace,<s%> that he may <S%G2064>come<s%> to me: for I <S%G1551>look<s%> for him with the <S%G80>brothers.<s%>

As <S%G4012>touching<s%> our <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> I <S%G4183>greatly<s%> <S%G3870>desired<s%> him to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you with the <S%G80>brothers:<s%> but his <S%G2307>will<s%> was not <S%G3843>at<s%> <S%G3843>all<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3568>at<s%> <S%G3568>this<s%> <S%G3568>time;<s%> but he will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> he shall have <S%G2119>convenient<s%> <S%G2119>time.<s%>
<S%G1127>Watch<s%> you, <S%G4739>stand<s%> fast in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G407>quit<s%> you <S%G407>like<s%> <S%G407>men,<s%> be <S%G2901>strong.<s%>
Let <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> things be <S%G1096>done<s%> with <S%G26>charity.<s%>

I <S%G3870>beseech<s%> you, <S%G80>brothers,<s%> (you <S%G1492>know<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas,<s%> that it is the first <S%G536>fruits<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> and that they have <S%G5021>addicted<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> to the <S%G1248>ministry<s%> of the <S%G40>saints,<s%>)
That you <S%G5293>submit<s%> yourselves to <S%G5108>such,<s%> and to <S%G3956>every<s%> one that <S%G4903>helps<s%> with us, and <S%G2872>labors.<s%>

I am <S%G5463>glad<s%> of the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of <S%G4734>Stephanas<s%> and <S%G5415>Fortunatus<s%> and <S%G883>Achaicus:<s%> for that which was <S%G5303>lacking<s%> on <S%G5216>your<s%> part they have <S%G378>supplied.<s%>
For they have <S%G373>refreshed<s%> my <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and <S%G5216>your's:<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1921>acknowledge<s%> you them that are <S%G5108>such.<s%>

The <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G773>Asia<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you. <S%G207>Aquila<s%> and <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G782>salute<s%> you <S%G4183>much<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> with the <S%G1577>church<s%> that is in their <S%G3624>house.<s%>
<S%G3956>All<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G782>greet<s%> you. <S%G782>Greet<s%> you <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with an <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
The <S%G783>salutation<s%> of me <S%G3972>Paul<s%> with <S%G1699>my<s%> <S%G1699>own<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>
<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G1536>any<s%> man <S%G5368>love<s%> not the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> let him be <S%G331>Anathema<s%> <S%G3134>Maranatha.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you.

My <S%G26>love<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%> The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus and Timotheus.
